name: Kart Racing Simulator
description:
Install instructions

--Windows Instructions--

1. Open setup.exe

2. Select Idiom for setup then click "Ok"

3. Click next 2 times

4. Wait until it ends

5. Open "Kart Racing Simulator.exe" in desktop to start playing!

----------------------------------

--MacOS Instructions--

Open the "Kart Racing Simuator.app" file  to play.

------------------------------

--Linux Instructions--

UnZip "Kart Racing Simulator.zip" and open the file "Kart Racing Simulator.x86_64" to play!

--------------------------
